short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This minimalistic extension makes Gitlab always show merge request overview

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Latest versions of Gitlab started to hide Overview details when you're checking other parts of merge requests (e.g. commits, pipelines or changes).

This minimalistic open source extension makes MR details always visible.

Source: https://github.com/everyonesdesign/gitlab-show-mr-overview
